query: MATCH (dtd:ncs__DayToDayTask)<-[:ncs__hasDayToDayTask]-(jp:ncs__JobProfile)-[:ncs__hasSocCode]->(soc:ncs__SOCCode) WITH jp,soc,{title: jp.skos__prefLabel, dayToDayTasks:collect(dtd.ncs__Description)} as combinedProfiles RETURN {Title:combinedProfiles.title, LastUpdatedDate:jp.dct__modified, Url:jp.ncs__JobProfileWebsiteUrl, Soc:soc.skos__prefLabel, ONetOccupationalCode:'', AlternativeTitle:'', Overview:jp.ncs__Description, SalaryStarter:jp.ncs__SalaryStarter, SalaryExperienced:jp.ncs__SalaryExperienced, MinimumHours:jp.ncs__MinimumHours, MaximumHours:jp.ncs__MaximumHours, WorkingHoursDetails:jp.ncs__WorkingHoursDetails, WorkingPattern:jp.ncs__WorkingPattern, WorkingPatternDetails:jp.ncs__WorkingPatternDetails, HowToBecome:{EntryRouteSummary:'', EntryRoutes:{University:{RelevantSubjects:[], FurtherInformation:[], EntryRequirementPreface:[], EntryRequirements:[], AdditionalInformation:[]}}, MoreInformation:{Registration:[], CareerTips:[], ProfessionalAndIndustryBodies:[jp.ncs__HtbBodies], FurtherInformation:[jp.ncs__HtbFurtherInformation]}}, WhatItTakes:{DigitalSkillsLevel:jp.ncs__WitDigitalSkillsLevel, Skills:[]}, WhatYouWillDo:{ WYDDayToDayTasks:combinedProfiles.dayToDayTasks, WorkingEnvironment:''}, CareerPathAndProgression:{CareerPathAndProgression:[]}, RelatedCareers:[]}
